TopicTitle: EVA/IVA Animations When Doing Relevant Science

Articles.Content:
Well the title says it all.

I was thinking of the lovely animation we have for planting a flag and I thought to myself, 'Wouldn't it be nice if we had little animations for taking a crew report, surface samples, EVA reports etc.'

I think the crew report could possibly be seen thought the 'Cameras' in the bottom right that show your kerbals. They could all take out a clipboard or something...

For eva reports, your kerbal could just whisk out a clipboard, scribble and put it back.

For a surface sample, the kerbal could just pick up a rock and put it in his/her pocket.

It might even be possible to tailor the animation to each biome so that your kerbal does something a little different when in different places. Or perhaps the stupidity and courage ratings may change the animation slightly. All just ideas that I'm throwing out into the ethos.

Thoughts?
Awesome I look forward to the day when i can laugh at my silly wee kerbal as it fails to pick up rocks...
